::Skulletron::

         Skulletron just realized he could've been caught s=
pying.  He forgot Perndabot, and walked off.  Hopefully, HotRod was reprogr=
ammed now, after being repaired by Feline.  Yes, Skulletron just had to set=
up everybody in the right position, and then, victory would be achieved.  H=
e would have Feline use HotRod to cause some chaos, and then, Skulletron wo=
uld throw away Feline from his cabinet.  He would return to Zardus, and tel=
l him the bad news of Feline not surviving.  Then, Skulletron just had to p=
ick off of Zardus' other followers, slowly, and then, Skulletron and Zardus=
 would be the most powerful duo.  Skulletron and Zardus.  Yesssss..Skulletr=
on was heading to where Chordate was.

     He arrived.  He slowly, ever so=
 silently, crept up behind Chordate, and then quickly grabbed his ray gun a=
nd swung it at Chordate's head, trying to knock him out.
